points: Designed high-fidelity mockups and interactive wireframes in Figma and implemented the designs in WPF to deliver polished, production Windows desktop UX
Implemented data access via ServiceStack, using a mix of ORM and raw SQL queries to meet performance and querying needs for local databases
Integrated RoboDK simulations directly into the desktop application to validate and visualize robot motion plans
Developed custom path-planning algorithms (trajectory segmentation, path interpolation, dynamic waypoint modification) for robotic motion control and optimization
Captured and processed Zivid 3D point-cloud data and used HALCON image-processing routines to align scans with CAD models and automatically generate robot paths
Built cross-platform mobile applications in Flutter, translating Figma designs into production UI and integrating RESTful APIs for server communication
Developed native Android plugins (Java) for SMB network-share access and implemented GPS NTRIP/NMEA receivers for real-time location streaming
Maintained cross-platform consistency and performance across Windows desktop and Android, ensuring feature parity and reliable runtime behaviour
Developed an AR application in Unity to simulate modelled system integrations for industrial companies

entries.label: Bachelor of Games and Interactive Design

points: Developed games for different platforms in different group assignments and publication to stores
Advanced game design and development theories
Won a 24hr game design challenge for best overall complete game state

entries.label: Diploma of Digital and Interactive Games

points: Introduction to developing games through the use of Unity
Designed 3D assets through Autodesk 3ds Max and Autodesk Maya
Introduction to agile project management and software design documentation (GDD and TDD)
